short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Makes life easy with automatic & personalised messaging on Jeevansathi.com!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
As an avid user of matrimonial apps these days (Searching for a match, interested?ðŸ˜‰), there is a lot of hustle, especially to send messages!

And who does not like a personalised message to them? Well this plugin does the same for Jeevansathi website.

So, our task is now to shortlist a set of profiles, then go to the shortlisted page & trigger the 'Auto' button from the plugin.
There are a set of messages, one of which is picked & sent to the recipient during Automation.

Note: I or the plugin is not affiliated with the Website. It makes no API calls or hacks whatsoever in the website. It performs all the actions which are naturally done by the user, in the webpage. i.e. clicking on next button, typing & sending the message, etc.

Also, all is done in your browser and nothing is sent to any other server.

Can be easily used by anybody.
